price: ߒ߬ߓߊ߬ ߡߍ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߛߌߟߊ߲߫ ߠߴߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߢߍ߫ ߊ߬ ߢߊߞߕߐߡߊ߫ ߸ ߜߊ߲ߒߞߎ߲ߠߊߟߌ ߟߴߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߛߙߊ߬ ߓߟߋߓߟߋ
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَأَجۡرٞ كَبِيرٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna yakhshawna rabbahum bil-ghaybi lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun kabīrun
